ReceivedDocument.name: ReceivedDocument
ReceivedDocument.description: Contains a request for an operation to be performed on a document, such as rotating, splitting, or text extraction.

Direction.description: Specifies whether the org is receiving or sending the document.

HasAutoOcrDisabled.description: Determines whether text is extracted from the document automatically. Default is False.

IsActive.description: Specifies whether the document is being processed.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the received document.

OcrStatus.description: Current state of the text extraction process.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns the ReceivedDocument record.

Priority.description: Determines the order in which the document is processed when it is part of a queue.

Source.description: Origin of the incoming document. Can be used to specify processing priority.

StatusReason.description: Reason for the status when processing and transforming the document.
